item.title: Special Topic of Tzu-Chi at TCIVS
item.description: Special Topic of Tzu-Chi at TCIVS tags: TCIVS Side Project Special Topic :::spoiler [TOC] ::: Purpose of this file I just want to write up some problems while I set up the environment and hardware of this project Hardware info. Spec. Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ CPU ARM Cortex-A53 1.4GHz RAM 1GB SRAM Wi-Fi 2.4GHz and 5GHz Ethernet speed 300Mbps Bluetooth 4..2 Set up sequence(Ideal) Install OS to Raspberry pi You can just check this page
